Home Answers Answers.com > Wiki Answers > Categories > Food&Cooking > Restaurants and Dining Establishments > Fast Food > What kind of disease can you get from eating at a fast food restaurant? What kind of disease can you get from eating at a fast food restaurant? In: Fast Food [ Edit categories ]
Answer: Heart disease. High cholesterol.

What is in fast food restaurant food ? It is helpful to understand what the government allows in feed or to be used in conventional production: Dairy cows - antibiotics, pig&chicken byproducts, hormones (for growth), pesticides,... How much money do you save by not eating at fast food restaurants ? depends on how much you eat. lets say you get the 5.oo meal at some place 3 times a week. there are 4 weeks in a month and 52 in a year. 15x52 is 780$. but, you also have to eat 3 times a day 7 days... When eating at a fast - food restaurant what are some healthful choices you When eating at a fast ? Order grilled or roasted chicken..Order low-fat milk instead of soda How do you open a fast food restaurant ? prepare food quick freeze and store in deep freezer at -18 deg cent. while serving, defrost, heat and serve.dr.k.k.desaiaditya fast food center surat9537760435 Are Chinese restaurants fast food ? Depends if they hold the food until it's ordered, or prepare it fresh once being ordered. Fast food companies hold the food, ready to be served, then prepare it once ordered. So Chinese buffet would...
